headline: Gray-zone aggression now a material threat for businesses, according to new Willis report
summary: LONDON, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Global stability is entering a new phase – one defined not by clear lines of conflict, but by the ambiguous, deniable and strategically choreographed tactics that sit between peace and war – known as ‘gray-zone aggression’. That’s the key finding of a new report from The Willis Research Network and Elisabeth Braw, a senior fellow with the Atlantic Council. Gray-zone aggression has rapidly evolved into a material threat for businesses; disrupting markets,
